name: teletype
description: Share your workspace with team members and collaborate on code in real time

teletype.description: A set of APIs for packages to integrate with Teletype

askBeforeJoiningPortalViaExternalApp.title: Ask before joining a portal via an external application
askBeforeJoiningPortalViaExternalApp.description: When set, you will be asked for confirmation every time you follow a portal URL in a third-party application.

baseURL.title: API server base URL
baseURL.description: This should only be changed for development purposes. Changes take effect on the next package activation.

pusherKey.title: Pusher service key
pusherKey.description: This should only be changed for development purposes. Changes take effect on the next package activation.

pusherCluster.title: Pusher cluster name
pusherCluster.description: This should only be changed for development purposes. Changes take effect on the next package activation.

activePubSubGateway.title: The pubSubGateway that should be used for teletype (pusher or socketcluster)
activePubSubGateway.description: This should only be changed for development purposes. Changes take effect on the next package activation.
